subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When the Yankees lost Chien-Ming Wang to a base-running injury June 15, Hank Steinbrenner, the team’s co-chairman, blamed the National League’s adherence to old rules.
snippet: When the Yankees lost Chien-Ming Wang to a base-running injury June 15, Hank Steinbrenner, the team’s co-chairman, blamed the National League’s adherence to old rules.
